 aproach it.

"Well, that's a few year's more work," he says, dismounting I=
ron 
Raptor and landing on the ground. He stands up, walking next to her.

=
"Think Iris is somewhere under there?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica =
and Bloodystrike come up on either side of Desmonus, both 
bots having a bi=
t of trouble thinking of any intellegent comment.

"So," Bloodystrike final=
ly blurts out, moving closer to 
Desmonus, "How about that drink? And maybe=

later.."

Reptilica swears as he remembers some=
thing, "Hey, the mess hall isn't 
in this section of the base, we're going =
to have to wait till we land 
to get a drink."

He moves closer to Desmonus=
, "But we can still get the relaxing 
done.."
